Alarm Functionality

Detailed Description

conflate-alarm is a FIFO queue for passing alarms between threads.

Function Documentation

const char *  name,
const char *  msg 
)

Insert new alarm into queue.

Parameters:
queue The queue to add to.
msg message of <=255 characters for alarm
Returns:
true iff the alarm was enqueued

Destroy an alarm queue.

Parameters:
queue the alarm queue to tear down
alarm_t get_alarm ( alarm_queue_t *  queue  ) 

Get alarm from alarm queue.

Will return alarm with alarm->open = false if no alarms available.

To block until alarm is available to pull, wait on queue->empty

Parameters:
queue Alarm Queue to pull alert from.
alarm_queue_t* init_alarmqueue ( void   ) 

Create and initialize an alarm queue.

Returns:
the new alarm queue
